intro: Blupi and his monster friends embark on a brave mission to make human friends!
description:
A heartwarming visual novel where monsters prove they're not so scary.

Enter the world of Monster City, a fully illustrated visual story designed especially for young readers.

Meet Blupi and her adorable monster friends: Speedy Sisi, Shapeshifter Mimi, Snack Lover Bombo, and many more.
When they discover that humans think all monsters are scary, they embark on an adventure to prove them wrong.

With bravery, kindness, and some hilarious mishaps, the monsters try to show the world who they really are: friendly, fun, and full of heart.
Each chapter is filled with laughter, surprises, and unforgettable moments.

Will the children of Sunnyville accept them?

Will the adults run away in terror?

Or can a group of brave monsters teach an entire town about friendship?

Highlights
· 5 colorful chapters with over 20 illustrated scenes

· Hilarious monster dialogue and wacky situations

· A positive message about inclusion, courage, and teamwork

· No scary content: just laughter, learning, and lighthearted adventures

· Whether read alone or with an adult, Monster City is a delightful experience that feels like a picture book... with extra monster laughs!

Reading has never been so monstrously fun.
